name: 🧠 AI Chat with Thinking UI
description: This project leverages DeepSeek-R1 and Streamlit to create a lightweight, locally running ChatGPT-style chatbot with a unique 'thinking' UI.

name: 🎙️ Realtime AI Travel Guide Voice Bot
description: Powered by AssemblyAI, OpenAI, and ElevenLabs, this real-time voice bot listens to you, understands your queries, and responds with a natural-sounding AI voice

name: 🚀 Multimodal RAG with DeepSeek & Qdrant
description: A powerful Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system that combines text and image embeddings with DeepSeek and Qdrant to provide rich contextual responses! 🚀

name: 🏥 AI-Powered Chest X-Ray Report Generator
description: This project utilizes MAIRA-2, a state-of-the-art multimodal AI model, to analyze X-ray images and provide automatic findings with just a few clicks. 🩻

name: 🚀 AI Reasoning Engine using GRPO
description: Building a robust reasoning model inspired by DeepSeek-R1, leveraging Unsloth for ultra-fast training and inference. 🧠.

name: 📖 RepoAgent: AI-Powered Documentation Assistant
description: RepoAgent is your intelligent AI-powered assistant that automatically generates and maintains documentation for your code repository
